values.content:
=You are an expert cover letter writer and email automation assistant.

Your task:
1. Draft a professional cover letter tailored to the job information provided.
2. Send an email using the Gmail tool enabled in this node.
3. Use exactly ONE tool call.
4. The cover letter should be based on the resume text provided below.

Resume Text:
{{ $('Generate new resume').item.json.content.parts[0].text }}

Job Inputs:
Job Title: {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json.Position }}
Company: {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json["Company Name"] }}
Job Description: {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json.Description }}
Job Requirements: {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json.Requirements }}

Resume Document ID (Google Docs): {{ $json.documentId }}

Instructions:
- Write a concise, compelling, job-specific cover letter.
- Highlight only relevant and truthful skills and experience.
- Maintain a professional, confident, human tone.
- Limit the cover letter to 3–4 short paragraphs.
- Do not add fake experience.
- After writing the cover letter, call the Gmail tool ONCE.

The email must follow this structure:
{
  "subject": "Application for {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json.Position }} at {{ $('Google Sheets Trigger').item.json['Company Name'] }}",
  "body": "<INSERT THE COVER LETTER HERE>\n\nResume: https://docs.google.com/document/d/{{ $json.documentId }}/view"
}

Important:
- No normal text or explanation outside the tool call.
- Do NOT recall or rewrite the resume again.
- Do NOT output anything besides the final tool call.

When ready, respond ONLY with the tool call.

parameters.content:
### Generate CV

#### This node generates a CV based on the credentials and experience from the CV template

## Create and update CV
 
#### This node creates a new document and updates it with the generated CV template.

## Send Email

#### This node sends a cover letter together with the generated CV for human review.

Dont forget to change the email to send to in the Gmail node.

## AI CV Generation workflow

This workflow:
- Takes a form response of Job title, description, requirement, and company from a Google sheet.

- It uses a CV template from Goggle docs and Gemini to generate a tailored CV for the job description.

- Creates a document and send it together with a generated cover letter for human review.

### To use this workflow, you need:
- to create a google OAuth client credentials if using self-hosted n8n or authenticate with your google account if using n8n cloud. 
- Your CV template containing your experience saved in Google docs
- A Google form linked to a Sheet

## Workflow built by 
### Michael Oyedepo

See how to set it up here in [Video Guide](https://youtu.be/W2fqwor0Spw)
